name: Saloon Showdown VR
description: Saloon Showdown VR is a virtual reality shooter based in the old west. Can you make your way through the town and stand toe to toe with the deadliest gun in west? Make use of cover, exploding barrels, moving carts & your trusty old 6-shooter and return peace to this lawless town.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Sound Card: Any! Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive VR Headset & Controllers
